data.title: Good food, good drinks, good vibes
data.text: A local gem. Pretty much can't go wrong with any grilled cheese that you order on the menu (or anything on the menu, for that matter). Staff is always friendly, worth knowing that it is a laid back environment so it's worth going while you're not in a rush. Reasonable prices and an excellent variety of beers. I'd recommend this place to anyone looking for a chill place to grab lunch with friends or solo.

data.title: Grilled cheese...yes please!!
data.text: There's more to this wonderful restaurant than an amazing grilled cheese, but #6 is my favorite! Served with a side of goldfish crackers, I'm in an upgrade of my childhood!  There are so many local classics, like chips and Lawson's dip, to delicious potato croquettes!  This is great for a business lunch, a night out, or grabbing a bite before a show.  They have a huge menu of local brews and tasty drinks, along with unique desserts served daily.

data.title: Service
data.text: I was in Lockview for the first time on a very busy Friday night this past summer. A server named Kelly went out of her way  to make me feel welcome in the midst of the business. I appreciated her going above and beyond for me!

data.title: Great food, great drinks and excellent service!!
data.text: I highly recommend this place! Corrbol atmosphere, awesome bloody Marys and the Lockview croquettes are great!! Don't forget the wedge salad, delicious! Tyler was our server, he gave us very good service and was friendly and helpful with making our choices!! Wish we lived closer!

data.title: Incredible atmosphere, Comforting food
data.text:
We dined at the Lockview with a large family group one Sunday evening.  The atmosphere was perfect;  the temperature was just-right, the music was eclectic and not so loud that our group couldn't converse with each other. 

We were all impressed with the food.  We probably tried every sandwich on the menu between us, and there was hardly a bite left on any of the plates.  While there, I was already thinking ahead to when we could return.

data.title: Worth the visit
data.text: Atmosphere is cozy with lots of seating at tables or booths. My no. 13 cheese sandwich was excellent. Havati cheese, artichokes and I added bacon, excellent tasting sandwich.  Sandwich was so hearty, I brought half home. Added sweet potato fries for an additional $2.00 and worth every bite. Husband had the no. 3 and said he loved his meal, tooinncluding the fresh cut fries.  This is the type of place you want to go over and over again and try something different. Prices are reasonable except the beer, on the pricey side.

data.title: Microbrews for Miles
data.text: Want to try some local or national microbrews? This is your place. The grilled cheese sandwiches are awesome. Free parking is near by and you can walk to Canal Park from their doorstep.

data.title: Sad the rooftop patio closed on Mondays:-(
data.text: The Lockview, hands down, is one of my favorite restaurants to visit in downtown Akron during the summer. The upstairs patio doesn't have a view but it's just funky enough to make you want to go hang out there.  I hate that the  patio is closed on Mondays!    Excellent beer selection and decent food. The hamburgers are always good and my favorite food on the menu is the fish tacos.

data.title: If you love a grilled cheese...
data.text: Stopped in after hearing good things from a friend and had a good meal. All of the grilled cheeses sounded amazing, along with a lot of other items on the menu. The sandwiches are very good, a decent size, but not particularly hearty. I probably could have eaten another! Staff was friendly and there were plenty of drinks to choose from. Definitely worth a stop if you're a fan of a good grilled cheese.

data.title: Big city vibe in a small city location.
data.text: When I walk into this restaurant/bar it gave me a big city vibe. I was like wow the setup is unique from the chalkboard with a list of drinks to the nice jazz music playing in the background. I choose to eat the spicy crab dip and I was impress. This spot is definitely a five star in my book.

data.title: Always pretty darn good
data.text: I work nearby so I get to visit The Lockview frequently. Very laid back atmosphere, with an eclectic mix of food and beer to match. Everyone raves about the grilled cheese, but I love the fish taco. Also recommend the tots and fried pepperoni! You can't go wrong in this warm, welcoming establishment!

data.title: Before getting on the train
data.text: Enjoyed some lunch before getting on the Cuyahoga Valley Train. Had my 8 and 10 year old boys with me. It's a bar setting, but comfortable for families at lunch. Grilled cheese is their specialty. Different varieties, but my boys settled for an original. Plus bacon. Sweet potato fries were awesome. Husband's beer was warm, the mountains were not blue...lol, but they offered a frosted glass. Prices were reasonable. We will come back.

data.title: The PERFECT grilled cheese everytime
data.text: They have a great variety of grilled cheese sandwiches. Perfect for lunch! Great prices, good service and their soup is delish too!

data.title: Super amazing Grilled Cheese!
data.text: The menu for grilled cheese sandwhichs is awesome-and every bite is yum! Great place for any kind of evening, date, downtown dirty, day or night. The beer selections and everything else has always consistently been above and beyond. Highly recommend to any grilled cheese and/or beer lover....

data.title: Weird Al was in town..
data.text: We had a long wait for our food, but with saying that we were there on a Friday night with events at the Lock 3, a baseball game going on and Weird Al was performing across the street at the theater. Our server was really nice, she kept us informed and updated. We will go back again just to give it a 2nd try. The food was hot and good when it came out. Our daughter has been here several times and loves it. Our son loved his grilled cheese.

data.title: Super Duper Grilled Cheese
data.text: The bartender was so outgoing and told us about the area.  We loved our grilled cheese.  13 different ones to choose from on the menu. Great Place.  I will go back if we make it to Akron again.

data.title: Great grilled cheese. Great beer.
data.text:
I am upgrading my previous review because they have definitely improved the service at Lockview. 

Love the 12 gourmet grilled cheese options. My favorite, #3. My wife loves #6. Explore the options on your own. 

The beer list is epic. And I always find something new!

Enjoy.

data.title: best grilled cheese EVER!
data.text: Gourmet grilled cheese, so many to choose from, friendly service, Daughter and son took me for birthday dinner before roller derby.

data.title: Great food and atmosphere
data.text: I have come here a few times and I love their beer selection! Their food is also delicious. The staff kind and helpful. It's nice for couples and large groups.

data.title: Just okay for me.
data.text: Lots of folks, love, love this place.  I just didn't get it as it was just average to me.  The food didn't stand out and the ambiance was lacking  and I am usually open to anything eclectic or otherwise.
